I'm doing well in school, but I wish the weather was warmer.
i am saving money to buy my first car.

content.text: Hi there! I see you're also a college student. What are you studying?
I'm studying accounting! What about you?
I'm in the business school too, but I'm not sure what I want to do yet.
Well, it sounds like you have a lot of options. What are you interested in?
I'm interested in a lot of things, but I'm not sure what I'm good at.
Well, you could always try taking some different classes and seeing what you like.
That's a good idea. I'll have to do that.
I'm sure you'll figure it out! You seem like a smart person.
I like to read, watch TV, and spend time with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I like to read too. What are some of your favorite books?
I like a lot of different kinds of books, but I'm really into historical fiction right now.
Oh, that's cool. I haven't read much historical fiction, but I've heard it's good.
Yeah, it can be really interesting.
I'm going to have to check it out sometime.
